column4: hi folks, i've been using feisty beta.  but i'm not getting any Upgrade button in both update manager and adept (using kubuntu).  I'm pointing my sources to Taiwan.  COuld that be the problem?
[acid] Neatchee: in that case i'm on the final then. thanks :P

now I just wish the repos would speed up so I can install some extras :O
